Package fr.avenirsesr.portfolio.security.services

Class JWTService

java.lang.Object
fr.avenirsesr.portfolio.security.services.JWTService
@Service public class JWTService extends Object
Service used to checks and parse JWT.

  • Method Details

    • extractModulusAndExponent

      protected Optional<ModulusAndExponent> extractModulusAndExponent(String jwksResponse, String kid)
      Extracts the modulus and exponent corresponding to a key id from a JWKS response.
      Parameters:
      jwksResponse - The JWKS .
      kid - The key id of the key associated to the modulus & exponent.
      Returns:
      An Optional of ModulusAndExponent.

    • generateRSAPublicKey

      protected Optional<PublicKey> generateRSAPublicKey(String alg, ModulusAndExponent modulusAndExponent)
      Generates a RSA public key.
      Parameters:
      alg - The algorithm specified in the id token.
      modulusAndExponent - The modulus and exponent.
      Returns:
      An Optional of the Public key.

    • getPublicKey

      protected Optional<PublicKey> getPublicKey(OIDCIdToken idToken)
      Gives the public key associated to an idToken header. If the key does not exist in the key repository it is generated.
      Parameters:
      idToken - The id token which contains in its header the properties kid and alg.
      Returns:
      An optional of the publicKey.

    • parseAndCheckSignature

      public Optional<io.jsonwebtoken.Claims> parseAndCheckSignature(OIDCAccessTokenResponse accessTokenResponse)
      Parses an access token and checks its signature.
      Parameters:
      accessTokenResponse - The access token response which contains the access token and the id token.
      Returns:
      An Optional of Claims.
